showerReviews.reviewText: Beautiful  space for celebrating special occasions. We were there for a baby shower itbwas fabulous

My friends and I booked the gathering house for a baby shower. We thought the price was great, and the venue is super cute and great size for a small event. The first red flag of many is that they do not allow you to tour the facility and ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Outdoor chairs,tables, arch's. These things are a lot to add onto a day. Over all if you want things to be stress free I would not suggest this place. I think it would be ok for a bridal shower or birthday

‚Ä¶ either of them no matter how far in advance you try. Nature trail, open areas for group activities, & a fairly good amount of parking make this a nice place to spend a sunny afternoon with the kiddos or host a scouting event or baby shower.
This was a lovely park.  The grounds looked nice and we'll kept. The gathering house was a perfect spot for a baby shower!!
